amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for periodic censuses and programs by $3 million and to increase funding for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for the purpose of salmon propagation by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Periodic Censuses and Programs by $3 million and to increase funding for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for the purpose of salmon propagation by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McDermott amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McDermott amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. McDermott.
